name: Mark-Steven Micheals
description: I’m an open minded man and I’m the type of person who accepts people as they are because life comes with different things. I’m a fair individual who adapts to changes in life and enjoys life to the fullest. My friends tell me I have a very big heart and also a great sense of humor. I love to laugh and always be happy. After been divorced for a while now, I’m looking to meet a woman that I can spend the rest of my life with. A woman that I can love,cherish and trust with all my whole being and heart. I pray for the will of God almighty that he will provide me with that kind of a woman someday in my life.
